Enable or disable the setup wizard. When: Enable or disable the setup wizard. When disabled, the wizard will appear on next dashboard login.

To reset and show the wizard again, set: To reset and show the wizard again, set the Wizard Status to "Not Completed" and save. The wizard will appear on the next dashboard refresh.
Resetting the wizard will not delete any: Resetting the wizard will not delete any previously saved settings (store name, email, currency, etc.). It will only trigger the wizard to appear again.
Wizard has been reset. Refresh the page: Wizard has been reset. Refresh the page to see the wizard again.
